categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: The Emperor's Trophy was a short story and role-playing game written by Peter Schweighofer, originally published in Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 11 and later reprinted on Hyperspace.
After the duel on Cloud City, Lord Vader arrives at the Mount Tantiss storehouse.
The Sith meets with his master the Emperor.
He brings a trophy: his lightsaber — and the remains of Luke Skywalker's severed head.
Palpatine reveals that he has forseen Skywalker's fate, and returns to Coruscant.
